Primera División de Fútbol Profesional A: C.D. Atlético Balboa finished 10th with 15 points from 18 games, having won 4, drawn 3, and lost 11. They scored 15 goals, conceded 31, and had a goal difference of -24.
Alianza F.C. finished 5th with 28 points from 18 games, winning 8, drawing 4, and losing 6. They scored 26 goals, conceded 24, and had a goal difference of 2.
C.D. Luis Ángel Firpo finished 3rd with 28 points from 18 games, with 7 wins, 7 draws, and 4 losses. They scored 25 goals, conceded 18, and had a goal difference of 7.
Municipal Limeño finished 7th with 20 points from 18 games, winning 5, drawing 5, and losing 8. They scored 27 goals, conceded 29, and had a goal difference of -2.
